title: 07/14/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 07/14/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's All Star Game and explains why the past few days have been a highlight for the sport of baseball. Angels Manager Joe Maddon joins the show to describe who he compares Shohei Ohtani to, as well as discusses why he's happy MLB will be doing away with some of its pandemic rules. And Seahawks QB Russell Wilson makes his return to the show for the first time since his headline making interview with us in February.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
